greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T, read by antidiagonals: T(n,k) = 0 if n-k >= 1 or if k-n >= 6, T(0,0) = T(0,1) = T(0,2) = T(0,3) = T(0,4) = T(0,5) = 1, T(n,k) = T(n-1,k) + T(n,k-1).
comment: A hexagon arithmetic of E. Lucas.
reference: E. Lucas, Théorie des nombres, A.Blanchard, Paris, 1958, Tome 1, p.89
mathematica: Clear[t]; t[0, k_ /; k <= 5] = 1; t[n_, k_] /; k < n || k > n+5 = 0; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = t[n-1, k] + t[n, k-1]; Table[t[n-k, k], {n, 0, 12}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 18 2013 *)
xref: Cf. Similar sequences A216230, A216228, A216226, A216238
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 16 2013
